attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, consider the behaviour of most Members of Parliament to be absolutely scandalous in their abuse of the expenses system.

We call on the Prime Minister to act in the interests of Great Britain, by calling for an immediate General Election where every Member of Parliament standing for re-election must make publicly available an (unaltered) copy of his/her expense claims during the last Parliament to all electors in his/her constituency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
